benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/accounts/{accountId}/emails - Add account email

covered: Happy path and multiple successful POST scenarios (TC01, TC02, TC03, TC04, TC05) covering 201 responses and Location header
Robust validation coverage: malformed JSON (TC10), missing fields (TC11), invalid email format (TC12), invalid accountId (TC07), missing accountId (TC08), non-existent account (TC09)
Auth and header coverage: required header (TC05, TC13) and unauthorized/forbidden (TC14)
Boundary and edge cases: empty body (TC17), large payloads (TC16), extra fields in payload (TC06), extra query parameters (TC18), unicode (TC21), SQL injection (TC23), XSS (TC24)
Resilience and reliability: external service down (TC15), slow DB (TC19), transient failure and retry (TC25)
Edge cases: consistency and regression (TC22, TC26, TC27)
gaps: Rate limiting / throttling scenarios are not tested
Caching behavior headers (ETag, Cache-Control) are not tested
Internal server error (HTTP 500) scenarios not explicitly covered
Duplicate submission of the same email is not explicitly tested
recommendations: Add tests for internal server error (simulate DB failure returning 500) to ensure proper server error handling
Add a test for duplicate email submission to verify idempotency or proper error
Add rate-limiting/throttling tests to ensure API handles bursts
Add tests for caching headers like ETag/Cache-Control if applicable
Consider explicit tests for empty content-type or incorrect content-type header, and ensure 400 response
